en_US.name: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Generation
en_US.description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, spatial audio, and MagSafe charging case. Up to 6 hours of listening time.

de_DE.name: Apple AirPods Pro 2. Generation
de_DE.description: Premium kabellose Earbuds mit aktiver Geräuschunterdrückung, räumlichem Audio und MagSafe-Ladehülle. Bis zu 6 Stunden Hörzeit.
